answers.answer: Are your blood sugars excellent controlled?  Am concerned about the left sided symptoms, which could indicate neurological condition.  You definitely should bring this up to your doctor.Ideally you would keep your blood sugars under 140 at all times, and more ideally under 120.  This would help reverse symptoms if they are from diabetes.Can recommend book by Dr. Richard Bernstein - you can google him - diabetes solution, if you really need to get your blood sugars down.Best wishes

question: I am an insulin - dependent  diabetic, I am experiencing tingling aches throughout my body mostly in my breast and frequently on the left side of my body! To what can I contribute this to?
title: ~~~~~~~~~~ WHY~~~~~~~~~~
